transArray.content: The location of the hotel is easy to find. There is a Big Yali Hotel at the door. There is the smell of coffee when you enter the lobby. The receptionist also greets you warmly, takes your temperature and disinfects. The epidemic prevention and control is very thoughtful. There are also robot services that can deliver food, guide, etc. The room was clean and tidy. The stay was very comfortable. I will stay here for future business trips!

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a good review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there. The hotel also has Free parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel can become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
